<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Hired Killer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=272)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 122</row>

</column>

Your life truly began after your first kill. Maybe you killed in self-defense, maybe it was a crime of passion, or maybe it was just an accident and you were a kid in the wrong place at the wrong time. In the end, the why doesn't matter. You got away with it. And then you found that maybe it didn't bother you as much as it should have. And maybe, just maybe, you had a talent you could use to forge a life for yourself. A blood-soaked talent and a blood-soaked life, sure. But it's yours.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Dexterity, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) skill, and the [Underworld Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Terrain Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=852) skill feat, choosing a terrain appropriate for where you make your kills.
